org.apache.batik.util.gui.resource
Interface ActionMap

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSSMediaPanel, CSSMediaPanel.AddMediumDialog, CSSMediaPanel.Dialog, DOMViewer, FindDialog, JErrorPane, JSVGViewerFrame, LanguageDialog, LanguageDialog.Panel, MemoryMonitor, NodePickerPanel, NodePickerPanel.NameEditorDialog, URIChooser, UserStyleDialog
public interface ActionMap

This interface represents an object which maps actions to strings

Method Summary
 Action getAction(String key)
          Returns the action associated with the given string or null on error
 

Method Detail

getAction

Action getAction(String key)
                 throws MissingListenerException
Returns the action associated with the given string or null on error

Parameters:
key - the key mapped with the action to get
Throws:
MissingListenerException - if the action is not found
